**Modeling and Simulation Software Tender**
================================jenisummerups537w65yd6 newspaper version , $$dis Wir_

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for modeling and simulation software.

| **Field** | **Information** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-22-01014828 |
| **Solicitation Number** | W8485-22MAK1 |
| **Publication Date** | November 25, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | December 9, 2022, 2:00 p.m. Local Time |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of National Defense |
| **Contractor Contact** | Heard, James, James.Heard@forces.gc.ca |
| **Trade Agreements** | This tender is open to eligible suppliers under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Application Instructions**

* Interested suppliers must submit their applications electronically through the Canada Buys Platform.
* The tender document contains all necessary information, including the tender notice, evaluation criteria, and contracting terms.

**Submission Requirements**

* Suppliers must provide a detailed description of their modeling and simulation software and its capabilities.
* The software must meet the Department's requirements and specifications.

**Award Process**

The award will be made based on a competitive procurement process. The Department reserves the right to accept or reject any or all portions of a bid.
